page.title: 06Leisure,Recreation,Bathgate
page.content: Bathgate houses a fair amount of leisure and recreation facilities. There is a swimming pool, a B.M.X. track, a bingo hall, a running track, a community centre, discotheque, various adventure parks, a snooker hall, video arcades, tennis courts and a cinema. The swimming pool is an old building, recently renovated. It is an attractive building with a brown and red exterior. The interior is in blue, white and brown tiles. It has a deep end of approx. 3metres, a length of 25metres and breadth of 6 metres. It used to have a diving board but it hasn't any more. It costs 22p. to get in, for half an hour. The B.M.X. track in Bathgate is the main one in West Lothian, where many championships are held.
